name: grocerygo
description: 1) created new react app- frontend 2) organised components -: button , header , AddGroceryPage , updateGroceryPage , EditGroceryPage , GroceryList , GroceryItem  3) implemented navigation using React route-: "/" - Home or grocery list page "/add" - add grocery page "/edit/:id" - Edit grocery  4) implemented form validation for add grocery 5) used fetch to interact with backend api 6) all CRUD functionalities implemented 7) added pagination , search , sort  8) Testing- tested all crud functions adding/editing/deleting a grocery updates in atlas compass successfully added / updated message , errors checked
